results.name: Right digitorial function Rd(n) = abcd...*bcd...*cd...*d...*..., for n = abcd... in decimal notation.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = 0 iff n == 0 (mod 10). - _M. F. Hasler_, Feb 25 2019
mathematica: Table[d = IntegerDigits[n]; rd = 1; While[ Length[d] > 0, rd = rd*FromDigits[d]; d = Drop[d, 1]]; rd, {n, 1, 75} ]
program: a067079 = product . map read . init . tails . show :: Integer -> Integer
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jan 05 2002
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 07 2002
